item.title: A Discussion Regarding the Design of Imports in Odin
item.description: This is an partially edited transcript from 2019-05-18 on the Handmade.Network Discord server. [18:42] lipid: I have a package with my extra math stuff at shared:lipid/math, but I also import core:math. The package name in lipid/math is "lipid_math", not "math", but it gives me Redeclaration of 'math' in this scope on that line" [18:42] lipid: renaming the folder solves the issue [18:43] gingerBill: @lipid Just rename the package name, it can be anything.
